text: Alessandro Criscuolo (15 July 1937 â€“ 10 March 2020) was an Italian judge. He was President of the Constitutional Court of Italy between 12 November 2014 and 24 February 2016. He was a Judge on the Court between 2008 and 2017. He was born in Naples, Italy. Criscuolo died on 10 March 2020 at the age of 82.Morto Alessandro Criscuolo, ex presidente della Corte Costituzionale: aveva 82 anni ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Jurists from Naples Category:Politicians from Naples Category:Italian judges
title: Alessandro Criscuolo
